name: maladjustment
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of not being prepared for the demands of life, which often leads to problems with behaviour: antisocial behaviour and other signs of maladjustment See
maladjusted
More examplesFewer examplesThe school suggested she see a psychiatrist to determine the cause of her maladjustment. Deprivation at home can lead to various forms of maladjustment.They have written about adolescence as a period of maladjustment and withdrawal.
